  • Remember the password setup:
    When creating your vault password, there are no strict requirements, so you can use any combination of characters, including no special characters or specific length.

  • Still have access on another device?
    If youâ€™ve enabled Face or Touch ID on a second device, you might be able to reset your vault password from Settings > Security.
